parameters.name: CaSn
parameters.description: The SN serial number of the CA certificate to which the device certificate to be queried belongs, used to uniquely identify a CA certificate. Value range: no more than 128 bytes.

parameters.name: DeviceSn
parameters.description: The SN serial number of the device certificate to be queried, used to uniquely identify a device certificate. Value range: no more than 128 bytes.

parameters.name: MqttInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID to which the device certificate is bound, i.e., the instance ID of the Cloud Message Queue MQTT version.
